original_text: And Shelah lived after he fathered Eber 403 years and had other sons and daughters.
korean_text: 에벨을 낳은 후에 사백삼 년을 지내며 자녀를 낳았으며

sentences.original_text: And Shelah lived after he fathered Eber 403 years
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 셀라는 에벨을 낳은 후 403년을 살았으며

sentences.original_text: and had other sons and daughters.
